mapper.select: SELECT #{period} as PERIOD , WH_LOC_ID as LOCID, WH_LOC_CODE as LOCCD , WH_LOC_DESC as LOCNM, #{materialcode} as ITMCD , (SELECT STK_DESC FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_CODE = #{materialcode}) as ITMNM, #{maximumqty} as MAXQTY, #{reorderqty} as REORDQTY ,nvl(#{safetyqty} , 0) as SFTYQTY FROM SYS0028M WHERE WH_LOC_CODE = #{locationcode}
